name: Wake Up (itch) (antonits)
description:
IDEA:Wake up is a game about finding the exit from your dream while running away from your nightmares.

GAME CONTROLS:
Move with W,A,S,D and press ESC to exit.

GOAL:

Try to reach the highest level possible.

GAME MECHANICS AND TIPS:

Play with the sound on (recommend 100% sound level, as it is not very loud).

When you enter spider web move your mouse fast to remove it, otherwise you are not able to move.

When you pick up a battery (the shiny rotating orange square) the level will light up and your flashlight battery will refresh.

When the screen gets the static effect and heartbeat noise, this means a nightmare is close by.

When touched by nightmare the game is over.

The closer you are to the exit (place that emits green light), the clearer you will hear the music.

Bonus level are not in a labyrinth, but in open space filled with nightmares.

In bonus levels, the faster you hear the beat the closer you are to the exit.

Don't play the game too much, after all it is quite bad.
